item.title: Chicken Katsu Curry
item.description: Foreword This Recipe is for a Japanese Katsu Curry. I use Golden Curry Cubes as base We start with the curry, and then make the Katsu. Shopping list Golden Curry Cubes. Veg (Potatos, Carrots, Onions) Garlic Porkchops Panko Eggs The rest is prolly in your Pantry Preprep Chop the Onions Finely, Potatos and Carrots are fine roughly chopped. Chop the curry cube up aswell. Season the Porkchop with: Salt and Pepper Prepare a Breading Station 1 Bowl with Flour 1 Bowl with Egg 1 Bowl with Panko Letâ€™s start with the curry 1st. In a pot add the Onions and 2 cloves of garlic and fry them until soft and fregrent. 2nd. Add around 700-900 ml of water, depending on how thick you want it. 3rd. bring the water to a boil and put the cube on a ladel and mix it in with a spoon Note It takes a bit of time to dissolve, dont worry
